meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>morally good</kanji> person who has <kanji>mercy</kanji> upon people gives to <vocabulary>charity</vocabulary>. These people prove they're good by mercifully giving all their money away to the poor and needy.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
